name: Cavely
description:
Submission to MiniJam 125: Signal
Limitation: Everything is tied to the rhythm

Cavely

Make your way down into the cave as fast as possible!
Can you find all 16 coins and the secret hidden gamemode?
Find out how fast you can beat this little speedrun platformer!

Controls
  • Controller support (and recommended)
  • ESDF or Arrow Keys to move and jump
  • Any other Pico-8 bindable keys are all jump as well
Tips & Tricks
  • You should check for secret fake walls 👀
  • Web version might be laggy, for smooth platforming the downloaded version is recommended.
Pico-8 Cartridge

v1.0.0
